column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) of the head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with sagittal section. We observe slice n°129 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The section reveals the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 195.1172 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 10.5469 mm³, the third ventricle of volume 130.5176 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 67.2363 mm³, the brainstem of volume 1071.8262 mm³, the cerebrospinal fluid of volume 122.6074 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 631.4941 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 6904.2480 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 185.8887 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 17.1387 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1845.7031 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 167.4316 mm³ and the right ventral diencephalon of volume 214.8926 mm³.

Magnetic resonance image (MRI) size (128, 256, 1) capturing the head of a man aged  of 37 years old, with a sequence weighted in T2 and sagittal section. The specific slice is number 129, counted from the right hemisphere of the skull.
